title: Coronavirus Homestead Plan to Alleviate Fear & Be Prepared
itunes:title: Coronavirus Homestead Plan to Alleviate Fear & Be Prepared
description: During this unprecedented time with the Coronavirus, I'm sharing what we're doing (and you can too) to stay calm, be prepared, and help others. Where to find staples (and what we're stocking), plans for growing food and herbal medicine, plus involving the family and kids. FREE Organic Gardening Workshop https://melissaknorris.com/workshop and links to tutorials resources from today's episode https://melissaknorris.com/246
